testsuite.name: Script.NewDocumentNegativeScenerio
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into EWA Enter valid user name into username field Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Click Login button Session for user is already active.Do you want to create new session? dialog box displayed User click on OK button, User logged in successfully...

Scneario 01: Create newdocument without folder Click on Newdocument tab Click on create button Click on destination location textbox Click on destination location OK button without selecting a folder User should get 'Please select a folder to create document' warning message, Warning message displayed successfull Click on warning alert OK button Unable to create document without folder

Scenario 02:Create newdocument without document type Click on destination location textbox Expand the cabinet Expand the drawer Select a folder Click on destination location OK button Click on create button without selecting document type User should get 'Select document type' warning dialog Unable to create document without document type
Scenario 03: New document without file name Click on create User should get'ReportName* field is required' warning message Unable to create a document without file name
